vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.33;
daughter of: Zelophehad (H6765);
sister of: Mahlah (H4244), Noah (H5270), Hoglah (H2295) and Milcah (H4435H)
§ Tirzah = "favourable"
n pr f
1) one of the 7 daughters of Zelophehad the son of Hepher of the tribe of Manasseh
n pr loc
2) one of the kingdoms on the west of the Jordan conquered by Joshua and the Israelites
3) a Canaanite city, later capital of the northern kingdom of Israel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hija de Selofhad; tribu de Manasés; (b)   ciudad; territorio de Manasés
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
得撒 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 「討人喜歡」
陰性專有名詞
1) 瑪拿西支派希弗的兒子西羅非哈七個女兒之一 (民 27:1)
專有名詞 地名
2) 約旦河西岸的王國, 為約書亞和以色列人征服 (書 12:7-24)
3) 迦南城, 後來成了北國以色列的首都 ( 王上 15:33; 16:6,8,23)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
得撒 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 「讨人喜欢」
阴性专有名词
1) 玛拿西支派希弗的儿子西罗非哈七个女儿之一 (民 27:1)
专有名词 地名
2) 约旦河西岸的王国, 为约书亚和以色列人征服 (书 12:7-24)
3) 迦南城, 后来成了北国以色列的首都 ( 王上 15:33; 16:6,8,23)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Tirzah = "favourable"
n pr f
This name is used for:
1) one of the 7 daughters of Zelophehad the son of Hepher of the tribe of Manasseh
n pr loc
2) one of the kingdoms on the west of the Jordan conquered by Joshua and the Israelites
3) a Canaanite city, later capital of the northern kingdom of Israel
